{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Marketing Associate",
  "description": "The HRHive - Our client,&nbsp;Atinudah BrandCo is the creative marketing arm of Atinudah, a boutique agency helping brands across fashion, lifestyle, tech, and entertainment connect with culture, community, and commerce. We specialize in end-to-end campaigns, brand storytelling, and creative production that moves audiences.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Associate

Job Location:&nbsp;Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	As a Marketing Associate at Atinudah BrandCo, you will play a hands-on role in executing campaigns, supporting client accounts, and driving the day-to-day marketing work that keeps the agency running.
	You&rsquo;ll assist with content development, client communication, project management, and campaign reporting, learning how to build and manage impactful marketing campaigns from the ground up.
	This role is ideal for someone with a strong creative instinct, digital marketing know-how, and a hunger to grow in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
	You&rsquo;ll work directly with the Marketing Account Manager and cross-functional teams (designers, strategists, and content creators) to deliver bold, culture-driven campaigns.


Key Responsibilities
Client &amp; Campaign Support:


	Support day-to-day client communication, task updates, and internal coordination
	Help write briefs, gather campaign insights, and support creative brainstorming
	Assist in preparing presentations, reports, and marketing proposals
	Join pitch efforts and new client onboarding


Content &amp; Channel Execution:


	Develop content calendars and rollout plans for social media, newsletters, and other digital channels
	Draft copy for social posts, email campaigns, and marketing materials
	Coordinate with design and content teams to ensure timely delivery of asset
	Build and execute marketing strategies across digital, social, content, PR, influencer, and events


Project &amp; Task Management:


	Track campaign timelines, deliverables, and revisions across multiple accounts
	Update project trackers (e.g. Notion, Google Sheets) and follow up on outstanding tasks
	Assist in planning campaign activations or client-related events


Performance Tracking:


	Monitor basic KPIs using tools like Instagram Insights, Meta Business Manager, and Mailchimp
	Help compile campaign performance reports and highlight improvement area
	Capture client feedback and support campaign optimizations


Cross-functional Collaboration:


	Work with Atinudah Studio (design/production) and Concepts (events) to bring campaigns to life
	Attend client shoots, events, or activations when required to support execution


Requirements


	1&ndash;2+ years of experience in marketing, advertising, or brand communication
	Basic knowledge of digital marketing, content creation, and campaign execution
	Strong writing and communication skills
	Organized, detail-oriented, and eager to learn quickly
	Ability to multitask across clients and timelines in a fast-moving environment
	Familiarity with tools such as Canva, Meta Ads Manager, Notion, Slack, Google Suite, Mailchimp, Hootsuite, etc.
	Social media management or copywriting experience
	Passion for culture, lifestyle, and the African creative economy


Bonus If You Bring


	Experience in influencer marketing, email marketing, or PR
	Graphic design or video editing skills (even basic)
	Previous experience in fashion, entertainment, or culture-driven brands
	Entrepreneurial mindset or previous startup/agency experience


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;thehrhive@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-09-17",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "HR Hive"
    
  },

    }

}



Marketing Associate Job at HR Hive




        
    

        
        The HRHive - Our client, Atinudah BrandCo is the creative marketing arm of Atinudah, a boutique agency helping brands across fashion, lifestyle, tech, and entertainment connect with culture, community, and commerce. We specialize in end-to-end campaigns, brand storytelling, and creative production that moves audiences.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Associate

Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

            
    




	As a Marketing Associate at Atinudah BrandCo, you will play a hands-on role in executing campaigns, supporting client accounts, and driving the day-to-day marketing work that keeps the agency running.
	You’ll assist with content development, client communication, project management, and campaign reporting, learning how to build and manage impactful marketing campaigns from the ground up.
	This role is ideal for someone with a strong creative instinct, digital marketing know-how, and a hunger to grow in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
	You’ll work directly with the Marketing Account Manager and cross-functional teams (designers, strategists, and content creators) to deliver bold, culture-driven campaigns.


Key Responsibilities
Client & Campaign Support:


	Support day-to-day client communication, task updates, and internal coordination
	Help write briefs, gather campaign insights, and support creative brainstorming
	Assist in preparing presentations, reports, and marketing proposals
	Join pitch efforts and new client onboarding


Content & Channel Execution:


	Develop content calendars and rollout plans for social media, newsletters, and other digital channels
	Draft copy for social posts, email campaigns, and marketing materials
	Coordinate with design and content teams to ensure timely delivery of asset
	Build and execute marketing strategies across digital, social, content, PR, influencer, and events


Project & Task Management:


	Track campaign timelines, deliverables, and revisions across multiple accounts
	Update project trackers (e.g. Notion, Google Sheets) and follow up on outstanding tasks
	Assist in planning campaign activations or client-related events


Performance Tracking:


	Monitor basic KPIs using tools like Instagram Insights, Meta Business Manager, and Mailchimp
	Help compile campaign performance reports and highlight improvement area
	Capture client feedback and support campaign optimizations


Cross-functional Collaboration:


	Work with Atinudah Studio (design/production) and Concepts (events) to bring campaigns to life
	Attend client shoots, events, or activations when required to support execution


Requirements


	1–2+ years of experience in marketing, advertising, or brand communication
	Basic knowledge of digital marketing, content creation, and campaign execution
	Strong writing and communication skills
	Organized, detail-oriented, and eager to learn quickly
	Ability to multitask across clients and timelines in a fast-moving environment
	Familiarity with tools such as Canva, Meta Ads Manager, Notion, Slack, Google Suite, Mailchimp, Hootsuite, etc.
	Social media management or copywriting experience
	Passion for culture, lifestyle, and the African creative economy


Bonus If You Bring


	Experience in influencer marketing, email marketing, or PR
	Graphic design or video editing skills (even basic)
	Previous experience in fashion, entertainment, or culture-driven brands
	Entrepreneurial mindset or previous startup/agency experience


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: thehrhive@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Warehouse Supervisor",
  "description": "At Eden Care and Resourcing Limited,&nbsp;our HR consulting firm provides expert guidance and tailored solutions to help businesses optimize their workforce, drive strategic growth, and foster a positive work environment.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Supervisor

Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for an experienced Warehouse Supervisor to oversee and coordinate the daily warehousing activities.
	You will implement production, productivity, quality and customer service standards and achieve the appropriate level of volume within time limits.


Responsibilities


	Achieve high levels of customer satisfaction through excellence in receiving, identifying, dispatching and assuring quality of goods
	Measure and report the effectiveness of warehousing activities and employee&rsquo;s performance
	Organize and maintain inventory and storage area
	Ensure shipments&rsquo; and inventory transactions&rsquo; accuracy
	Communicate job expectations and coach employees
	Determine staffing levels and assign workload
	Interface with customers to answer questions or solve problems
	Maintain items record, document necessary information and utilize reports to project warehouse status
	Identify areas of improvement and establish innovative or adjust existing work procedures and practices
	Confer and coordinate activities with other departments


Requirements


	A Degree in logistics, supply chain management or business administration.
	Proven work experience as a Warehouse Supervisor.
	Highly effective supervisory skills and techniques.
	Knowledge of warehouse software packages and MS Office proficiency.
	Ability to input, retrieve and analyses data.
	Hands-on commitment to getting the job done.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Proven ability to direct and coordinate operations.
	Strong organisational and time management skills.


Salary


	N90,000 - N100,000 monthly.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications and CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@edencarelimited.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email",

  "validThrough": "2025-09-17",

  },

Warehouse Supervisor Job at Eden Care and Resourcing Limited




        
    

        
        At Eden Care and Resourcing Limited, our HR consulting firm provides expert guidance and tailored solutions to help businesses optimize their workforce, drive strategic growth, and foster a positive work environment.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Supervisor

Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for an experienced Warehouse Supervisor to oversee and coordinate the daily warehousing activities.
	You will implement production, productivity, quality and customer service standards and achieve the appropriate level of volume within time limits.


Responsibilities


	Achieve high levels of customer satisfaction through excellence in receiving, identifying, dispatching and assuring quality of goods
	Measure and report the effectiveness of warehousing activities and employee’s performance
	Organize and maintain inventory and storage area
	Ensure shipments’ and inventory transactions’ accuracy
	Communicate job expectations and coach employees
	Determine staffing levels and assign workload
	Interface with customers to answer questions or solve problems
	Maintain items record, document necessary information and utilize reports to project warehouse status
	Identify areas of improvement and establish innovative or adjust existing work procedures and practices
	Confer and coordinate activities with other departments


Requirements


	A Degree in logistics, supply chain management or business administration.
	Proven work experience as a Warehouse Supervisor.
	Highly effective supervisory skills and techniques.
	Knowledge of warehouse software packages and MS Office proficiency.
	Ability to input, retrieve and analyses data.
	Hands-on commitment to getting the job done.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Proven ability to direct and coordinate operations.
	Strong organisational and time management skills.


Salary


	N90,000 - N100,000 monthly.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications and CV to: recruitment@edencarelimited.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email    

    

        Click here to Apply

Job Position: Operations Manager

Job Summary


	We are looking for a of a reliable Operations Manager to join our Beauty Salon.
	The ideal candidate should reside in nearby areas and proximity to town be ready to take on responsibilities with dedication.
	Key duties include Responsible for the day-to day operations of the Spa to include: meeting the financial goals of the organization, executing strategic plans to include marketing initiatives and staff training, acting as the liaison to other revenue centers on property, and professionally representing the facility.
	Uses the ability to lead and motivate staff to achieve high customer service standards, operational goals and exceed guest expectations.


Responsibilities


	Ensures that service standards are kept at a high level for guests by maintaining the standards set in the company&rsquo;s Vision Statement, Core Values and Brand Promises.
	Ensures the staff are fully knowledgeable on the use and benefits of services, products, programs, and activities by conducting regularly scheduled staff meetings.

	Provides excellent customer service and monitors guest feedback through customer care follow-up and surveys.
	Supervises and follows up on guest requests and comments.
	Works closely with the Spa Director to execute effective marketing and public relations strategy and business plan in a timely manner.

	Creates a team of service providers to meet all aspects of professionalism and service demands.
	Implements a strategy to promote spa services to attendees.
	Specifies and controls efficient usage of professional products for all services by completing a service cost analysis and implementing an inventory control system.
	Ensures an effective inventory system with the par stock levels implemented for spa equipment and supplies.
	Ensures compliance with all state licensing and health requirements.
	Provides reservation procedures using spa software or a manual reservation system.
	Perform other duties as assigned.

	B.Sc. or HND in Degree.
	Minimum of 2 - 4 years of Proven work experience as an operations Manager or similar role.
	Knowledge of professional spa services and treatments.
	Knowledge of retail operations and inventory systems.
	Effective leadership skills and a strong work ethic.
	Excellent verbal and written skills, customer service skills.
	Efficient, well organized, and able to handle a variety of duties simultaneously.
	Sales oriented, Creative in marketing and promotions.
	Energetic, enthusiastic and motivational.
	Professional manner, discretion, and appearance.

	Proficient in spa software (Fresha) and Microsoft Office products.
	Must be able to work effectively in a hospitality environment, communicate with others, effectively deal with customers and accept constructive criticism from supervisors.
	Must be able to change activity frequently and cope with interruptions.

N200,000 Monthly.

Operations Manager Job at Fave Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Fave Consulting Limited is a Nigerian-origin consulting firm, established in 2021, with operations now spanning both Nigeria and the UK. They focus on delivering tailored human capital, legal, IT, and financial solutions to organizations across diverse, high-demand industries—including healthcare, IT, logistics, construction, and security.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Manager

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for a of a reliable Operations Manager to join our Beauty Salon.
	The ideal candidate should reside in nearby areas and proximity to town be ready to take on responsibilities with dedication.
	Key duties include Responsible for the day-to day operations of the Spa to include: meeting the financial goals of the organization, executing strategic plans to include marketing initiatives and staff training, acting as the liaison to other revenue centers on property, and professionally representing the facility.
	Uses the ability to lead and motivate staff to achieve high customer service standards, operational goals and exceed guest expectations.


Responsibilities


	Ensures that service standards are kept at a high level for guests by maintaining the standards set in the company’s Vision Statement, Core Values and Brand Promises.
	Ensures the staff are fully knowledgeable on the use and benefits of services, products, programs, and activities by conducting regularly scheduled staff meetings.
	Assesses all employees’ progress continually, trains employees with positive reinforcement and disciplines fairly and consistently, participates in annual performance evaluations, and assists in the termination process when necessary.
	Provides excellent customer service and monitors guest feedback through customer care follow-up and surveys.
	Supervises and follows up on guest requests and comments.
	Works closely with the Spa Director to execute effective marketing and public relations strategy and business plan in a timely manner.
	Ensures fiscal responsibility through efficient scheduling of staff and makes necessary changes to stay within budgetary guidelines.
	Provides necessary financial information to the Accountant and Spa Director for accurate reporting of daily sales and financial performance.
	Ensures that financial goals are attained by developing and implementing a retail sales plan.
	Establishes service and retail goals for staff and provides guidance on how to achieve them.
	Monitors seasonal utilization patterns to be used in the budgeting process and effective payroll management.
	Submits all paperwork and financial reporting in accordance with the company standards.
	Develops and maintains accurate maintenance procedures and checklists through routine preventative maintenance and repair.
	Maintains a monthly inventory of supplies, equipment, and products.
	Creates a team of service providers to meet all aspects of professionalism and service demands.
	Implements a strategy to promote spa services to attendees.
	Specifies and controls efficient usage of professional products for all services by completing a service cost analysis and implementing an inventory control system.
	Ensures an effective inventory system with the par stock levels implemented for spa equipment and supplies.
	Ensures compliance with all state licensing and health requirements.
	Provides reservation procedures using spa software or a manual reservation system.
	Perform other duties as assigned.


Requirements


	B.Sc. or HND in Degree.
	Minimum of 2 - 4 years of Proven work experience as an operations Manager or similar role.
	Knowledge of professional spa services and treatments.
	Knowledge of retail operations and inventory systems.
	Effective leadership skills and a strong work ethic.
	Excellent verbal and written skills, customer service skills.
	Efficient, well organized, and able to handle a variety of duties simultaneously.
	Sales oriented, Creative in marketing and promotions.
	Energetic, enthusiastic and motivational.
	Professional manner, discretion, and appearance.
	Normal work hours: As specified in employment contract
	Proficient in spa software (Fresha) and Microsoft Office products.
	Must be able to work effectively in a hospitality environment, communicate with others, effectively deal with customers and accept constructive criticism from supervisors.
	Must be able to change activity frequently and cope with interruptions.


Salary
N200,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter in PDF Format to: recruitment@faveconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
